app.name: Plume
app.description: Compress your images with optimal quality

format.title: Output
format.tooltip: Keep preserves original format. HEIC files will be converted to JPEG.

level.title: Quality
level.tooltip: Light: maximum quality. Aggressive: minimum size.
level.pngLocked: PNG uses lossless optimization (oxipng). Compression level has no effect.
level.pngHeicWarning: PNG is not recommended for HEIC files: output will be larger. Prefer WebP or JPEG.

success.title: All images have been successfully compressed!
success.description: You can download your images or start over with brand new.
